entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of drizzle. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers late this afternoon. Fog patches late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
